title: #23: Alex & Gene Ciccolo - Instagram stories vs. Snapchat, Saint Tropez, Travel Tips, and Jealousy
itunes:title: #23: Alex & Gene Ciccolo - Instagram stories vs. Snapchat, Saint Tropez, Travel Tips, and Jealousy
description:
Alex & Gene Ciccolo, join Lauryn & Michael during their stay in France to discuss Travel, Saint-Tropez, why you don't get a hangover drinking French Wine, the benefits of studying abroad, Air France going on strike, traveling on a budget, Instagram stories vs. Snapchat, and jealousy.

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE

You will also find 28 weeks worth of fat burning, muscle toning, 27 minute long, effective workouts you can do at home with no equipment.
